page.title: 18Green Lane First School
page.content: This is an Infant School catering for 180 children set on the outskirts of Farncombe. The school opened in September 1983 when Binscombe First and Middle became Binscombe Middle and Green Lane First. At first there are six full time teachers plus the Headmaster, Mr. Corbett.The children range from five to eight years of age and are of varying ability. The children are offered a wide range of experiences in the school with the emphasis on Language and Maths., but including Music, P.E.,Science,Art,and R.E. We are fortunate in having a lively P.T.A.The parents are supportive.The school is strongly involved in the community, having an old people's club using the facilities once a fortnight and a toddler's group.
